amendment.description: Amendment adds to the bill's Regulatory Flexibility Act exemption for veterans rights-and-benefits rules, an exemption for rules pertaining to servicemembers and predatory lending.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Peters.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
